attributes.action: English Defence League the bad advertisement for the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
The government wants growth in the private sector hence Chancellor Osbourne's speech in 2010. Majority of private business investment in the U.K. will depend on international business.

Please sign this petition if you will like the government to debate whether our streets should be represented with this type of hooliganism and racism. This is a bad advertisement for prospective international businessmen/ women investing in the U.K.
